_meanings:
Excessive growth, 
increase, adding to, increasing; {#etatKalu#}
{#vyajanAnilErati(Bi)varDanaM praBaM janasya#} 
{#yadasmadviDEH pariboDanamAryasya#} <ls>K. 289</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> 
“Carrying coals to New-castle”, or “To
gild refined gold, to paint the lily,
… or with taper-light the eye of
Heaven to garnish is wasteful and
ridiculous excess”; See the other
phrases on the same page.
